Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory71.jpg'}
{3: 'â€” all members of the Forsaken retreat successfully, and Watanabe tallies up their losses in supplies and personnel.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "We're missing someone...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: "Report! I believe he's... still at the original HQ.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Forsaken Soldier', 3: 'He did not retreat in time, because he was trying to protect the foodstuffs Watanabe-San had procured earlier.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: "All of you, stay here. I'll bring that idiot back here.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: "I see nothing but Corrupted over there. How will you get the soldier out when you don't even have his coordinates? Not to mention, he could already be...", 4: '1'}
{3: '"He\'s probably already dead," Changyu almost said, before holding his tongue.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'No Forsaken gets left behind...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'With those words, Watanabe disappears alone into the yellow sands.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Sigh... these Forsaken people never listen.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Perhaps', 3: '23', 4: 'They have their own beliefs', 5: '23'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'He probably did not wish to endanger us as well...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'But with Watanabe-San alone, I calculate the odds of successfully rescuing the trapped soldier to be 7.28%...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Though I disagree with meddling in the affairs of the Forsaken, it is highly unusual that the Corrupted would assault Forsaken HQ in such numbers.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'This line of investigation may very well lead to our objective.', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Akdelik containers are equipped with communication devices. If the Corrupted could find this place by tracking comm signals, they could find the Eternal Engine next...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'That would be problematic. We must come up with a plan to retrieve the container.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'We can use the comm device', 3: '36', 4: 'Liv, can you trace the signal?', 5: '37'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Ah, that reminds me, Commandant. Liv, can you trace the signal from the lost container?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "I can try. Changyu, could you give me the lost container's comm signature?", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Sure, but can you really find it with that?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Have some faith in Liv. If she can't find it, no one can.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Closing her eyes, Liv conducts a thorough search. In an instant, her eyes reopen.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: 'Found you! The signal is weak, but map coordinates are confirmed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Strictly speaking, however, Gray Raven is acting in an assistant capacity to the ACA. Your decision, Changyu, will infleunce our plan of action.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Changyu understands that the decision, with the full weight of the Akdeliks behind it, rests on his shoulders.'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Changyu', 3: 'Mistress Jamilah always said that the essence of trade is cooperation, competition, and interaction, even though the Forsaken have never been the best trading partners.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Changyu', 3: 'But just as the Forsaken do not leave their own behind, so too will the Akdeliks hold onto partners who hold potential.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: 'It seems we have reached a conclusion, Commandant.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Gray Raven, commence rescue mission!', 3: '57'}
